ED_Title: Report of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals
ED_DecisionText: At its 20th plenary meeting, on 20 October 2021, the General Assembly took note of the ninth annual report of the International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals (footnote: A/76/248)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
